title: Updates a branding image and sets it as default
description: Update the priority of a specific branding image given the branding id in the url.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: memberId
path.description: Member id of the branding image owner

path.name: brandingId
path.description: Branding image Id to set as default

fields.name: BrandingId
fields.description: Branding image Id. Use this Id to add branding to your listings. This property is read-only.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: Branding image file name. This property is read-only. The file name may be different from the value provided during uploading the image.

fields.name: FileSize
fields.description: Branding image file size in bytes. This property is read-only.

fields.name: ImageUrl
fields.description: The location of the image. This property is read-only.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: The prorioty of this branding image relative to other uploaded images. This property is only applicable to agent branding and is ignored for listing specific branding. Default value is 0.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.
